reviews.sentence: Pleasant. we liked the friendliness of the staff the lobby and the restaurant. its location adjacent to the commercial stretsthe hallways leading to the rooms are gloomy the view from our room rather depressing. very difficult access by car due to street works. from all the wonderful Radison Hotels we stayed the one you might want to forget.

A surprisingly wonderful chain hotel in the city center. Immaculate of course. It s switzerland. Chose because of location amenities and price. The weekend rate was a great deal and I added breakfast at a reduced rate through an offer Radison sent in email. Well worth chf 25 for a most wonderful buffet including specialty pastries from my favorite patisserie and excellent service. We felt as though we were personal guests of the staff. Great capucino as often as we desired. The pool is actually long enough for laps. Not often in an indoor hotel pool. The area also has an OK gym steam and sauna and locker rooms. Our room was a courtesy upgrade to executive which was appreciated. With the free mobility pass which Basel hotels give guests and tram stops a few steps from the hotel getting anywhere in the city and environs is a delight. Of course it s a lovely walk to the marktplatz Munster the rhein museums shopping and much which this great historic city offers. We will stay against Radison blu Basel.

Carnival 2016 in Basel. It was very spectacular event at the middle of February. We chose the Radison Blu Hotel because of its good location center of the city shops restaurants museums and famous squares are near the hotel. 3 days and 2 nights was pleasant. Unfortunately servis staff had come in our room twice a morning so we noted that they really did not know when they should come to clean our room and do not disturb us. I liked our breakfasts we booked only them tasty and good variety and when we ordered supper it was tasty too. The hotel has a super swimming pool sauna and 24hour gym. One piquant detail in sauna everyone should take off the clothes. If you travel on car you can use the underground parking zone for free. We liked this hotel.

Comfortable Hotel Good Location. This hotel has comfortable rooms good service and nice amenities. it is location is ideal right next to the tram stop and also within walking distance to Starbucks and a local bakery. The hotel offers umbrellas so you do not have to pack your own. The staff are friendly and helpful. You can change money at the front desk so need to find a bank or Western union. Fitness center and pool are a plus.
Huge YES for radison blu Basel. Amazing hotel staff facilities location WIFI the best place to stay in Basel. Restaurant outdoor seating area needs to be available at night a little longer.

Business meeting in lobby. The radison blue in Basel is one of the best hotels in Basel. Today I met in the lobby with a partner in order to plan my journey to Brasil in july. The lobby is a really nice lounge still place to have a good drink and be inspired. Good service and mood there and located in the very city. Also good is that the hotel offers their own parking for guests. I had many meetings there and will have many more.

Another good hotel from the reliable Radison chain. We stayed here for 3 nights in early September me my husband and 7 year old daughter. I booked a standard double room and requested an extra bed for our daughter when we arrived we were given a business class room which was very large and comfortable and had a separate sleeping area for us. 2 TVs a safe fridge tea and coffee making facilities etc. The room was very quiet and a comfortable temperature and the beds were big and comfy. We all slept well. We used the gym and swimming pool these are good and the pool is plenty big enough to swim properly in The location of the hotel is very good a few minutes walk from the Swiss train station Bahnhof SB and a few minutes in the other direction for the old town. The area around the hotel is safe and clean and there are plenty of shops and restaurants close by. Paddy Reilys Irish bar next door serves decent beer and food at reasonable for Switzerland prices. We enjoyed our stay in Basel it is very under the tourist radar but has some excellent museums and a nice zoo and a nice mix of old and new buildings in the centre. It is easy to access the hotel from the airport either by taxi or airport bus line 50 to the train station cost about 4 francs. If we return to Basel we would stay at the Radison again.

Flying visit but time for wander. great location in the middle of Basel close to restaurants shops and sight seeing opportunities. Hotel was comfortable gym small but ok breakfast again ok. Waiter chose a good wine based on my preferences. Room was clean and comfortable and all staff very helpful. Certainly worth considering if wishing to be central.

Room was fine excellent mattresses bed and was usually cleaned early enough and coffee tea toiletries linen renewed as expected. No issues with staff on desk or rooms all very pleasant and acknowledged us and smiled. Glass bathroom wall a disaster sliding glass door provided no privacy as inches away from its wall and it kept sticking trapping person inside till we found a way of pushing it it allowed light to flood into room when other lights off disturbing other occupant it possibly provided a view to anyone passing by if door opened though there was a modesty panel across the middle. Location excellent for getting around Basel but front rooms which we had opposite a dance club so disturbed by music noise and people shouting in the early morning despite double secondary glazing. Very expensive ie what we paid for what is was I believe Swiss hotels are alowed to increase charges when there is an event on in our case the Swiss ATP Tennis and HerbstMese. so choose your dates carefully.

Nice hotel for business and pleasure. The Radison Blu Basel is convenient located close to the city center shops and Restaurants and is at walking distance from the SB railway station. Hotel has a good gym and a Large swimingpol Large enough to do swim trainings 20 meter.

Exceptional. Bed was divine room was clean swimming pool and sauna space and facilities there were great. Reception space is being reconstructed but the staff were great and there were some refreshments on offer all the time. And the best impression came from Hasan who was responsive and kind and multitasking with a smile. Congratulations on keeping him a happy employee.

Construction and special deal. Yes when we arrived we found out the hotel and especially the lobby is under construction and the pool is closed. As our reservation made months in advance stated “ pool access ” we posed a complaint. The desk manager was graceful and gave us free breakfast thank you. The rooms are very good insulation against noise top notch bed and bathroom very good. The coffee maker is hot water and Nescafé not exactly what we expect from a top hotel. A Nespreso or similar capsule based coffee would be a nice addition.

Very Good. Location was great easy walk from the train station. Hotel was smart and modern. Liked the snacks in reception. We travelled with friends who received a bigger room than us with a bath whereas we had an inner courtroom view with no room for 2 people in the bathroom our safe did not work even after we reported it to reception our bags could not be easily located after we had left them for a few hours after check out.

Needs improving. A number of areas require improvement eg furnishings availability of staff at reception communication between service personnel provision and layout of breakfast items. Please see comments already provided for specific examples.

Beautiful pool and sauna good breakfast options nice rooms. However as I reported to the staff a man came in and grabbed me when I was at the breakfast buffet. There was a complete lack of security at the hotel entrance and to the breakfast room restaurant and this lack of checks on who was getting in put my safety as a guest at risk.
Very Poor. I have several bug bites all over my legs torso behind my ear and nape of neck. When I told the reception staff it was handled very casually.
